text: is a Japanese footballer who plays as a midfielder for Urawa Red Diamonds in the J1 League. ==Career== ===Montedio Yamagata=== Yuruki made his official debut for Montedio Yamagata in the J. League Division 2, on 2 March 2014 against Shonan Bellmare in Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka in Hiratsuka, Japan. He subbed in the match for Hiroki Bandai in the 74th minute.
